topic.title: Uninstall the HP Helion Development Platform

body.p: The HP Helion Development Platform is installed in the overcloud of HP Helion OpenStack

ol.li: Log in to the Helion seed node.

codeblock.codeph: SERVICE_SHORT_NAME="development-platform" SERVICE_ID=$(keystone service-list | grep $SERVICE_SHORT_NAME | cut -d" " -f2) keystone service-delete $SERVICE_ID
